headline: Constantino Claims Record for Largest Congressional Announcement Crowd in U.S. History
summary: AMSTERDAM, N.Y., Feb. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Anthony Constantino’s campaign for Congress in NY-21 claims it calculated 3,000+ people in attendance making it the largest crowd size for a Congressional announcement ever. “We ran out of parking,” said Campaign Manager Lenny Roudik. “That was quite surprising as Anthony’s parking lot, which supports two factory buildings, is huge.” Enormous lines queued up separately for 1,000 hoodies, Neapolitan pizza, McDonalds, baccala fritters cooked by a

headline: McDonald's Tests Premium Caviar And Spicy Flavors To Engage Customers
summary: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) is introducing its first McNugget Caviar kits with Paramount Caviar as a special promotion linked to Valentine's Day. McDonald's Canada is rolling out a limited-time collaboration with Frank's RedHot to add new spicy items to its menu. For a company built on mass market favorites like burgers, fries, and McNuggets, NYSE:MCD continues to look for fresh ways to keep customers engaged. The caviar pairing reflects the current appetite for food experiences that feel premium...

headline: The Wait is Over! McDonald's Drops Final Rosters for the 49th Annual All American Games
summary: The desert heat is about to get even hotter! The 49th annual McDonald's All American Games is heading to Glendale, Arizona for the first time ever and the official rosters were just released featuring the nation's top 24 girls and 24 boys basketball players. This new class of hoopers represents the next wave of elite talent, with each player proving they've got the skills, stats and the heart to solidify their name in high school basketball history. headline: We Put It On Everything: McDonald's Canada Turns Up the Heat with Frank's RedHot®
summary: For the first time ever, McDonald's Canada is teaming up with the legendary hot sauce brand, Frank's RedHot®, to deliver a menu that's big on flavour and will leave you wanting more. And yes, we really did put it on everything.

headline: McDonald’s discounts, meal bundles lift traffic, says BTIG as it upgrades stock
summary: Investing.com --BTIG upgraded McDonald’s to Buy from Neutral, saying changes to the company’s value strategy are driving steadier traffic growth and setting up a stronger sales and earnings recovery. Shares of the company are up 1.12% in Monday premarket trading.

headline: Arcos Dorados Increases the Efficiency of Its Capital Structure

(NYSE: ARCO) ("Arcos Dorados" or the "Company"), Latin America’s largest restaurant chain and the world’s largest independent McDonald’s franchisee, announced on January 30, 2026, a proposed financing transaction designed to increase the efficiency of its capital structure. headline: McDonald's Debuts Exclusive McNugget® Caviar Just in Time for Valentine's Day - at No Cost to Fans
summary: To be known is to be loved, and we know our fans love pairing our crispy Chicken McNuggets® with their favorite caviar. Inspired by this perfect match, we're dropping our first-ever McNugget® Caviar kits featuring premium Baerii Sturgeon caviar on Feb. 10, exclusively available online. After all, nothing says 'ILY' quite like a limited drop from McDonald's just in time for your Valentine's Day plans.
